title: Anyones ping gone up?
body: Me and my 2 friends ping has gone up by a bout 40. from 25>65. We're on optus.

replies.body:
Mine fluctuates from 40 to 80. I don't mind really, there's literally no difference gameplay-wise.

The server updates every tenth of a second, so if your ping is below 100 then there's no delay between when you input a command and when it's executed.
